caller_intent: Kate Patel is seeking assistance to finalize a certificate of insurance after a policy was approved, involving payment processing and carrier assignment.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed payment details (routing and account numbers) for the insurance premium.
Submitted the payment and confirmed receipt.
Notified Kate that the carrier assignment (e.g., Travelers Insurance) would be communicated via email.
Explained the process of generating the certificate of insurance once the carrier is assigned.
Agreed to issue a blank certificate with 'for information only' wording until the correct carrier is identified.
knowledge_required: Insurance policy approval and certificate of insurance issuance process
Carrier assignment procedures for state programs
systems_referenced: Payment processing system (First Citizens' Banking Trust referenced)
summary: Kate Patel discusses finalizing an insurance certificate after policy approval. The agent processes the payment, confirms carrier assignment via email, and explains the certificate issuance timeline. A follow-up is needed once the carrier is assigned.
